message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than that price indicates. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $15,000 is already a very competitive offer for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. While I understand the value of the product, I still believe I should not exceed $10,000 for it. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
